item.title: Variational Inference: The Path Forward
item.description: Ever felt why we even need Variational AutoEncoders when simple AutoEncoders worked greatly? And what the heck is this Variational Inference anyway? Leave why or what, whats’ going on with its’ mathematics, too hard to grab any intutive understanding!! I dealt with these problems for long, and maybe others’ did too. Dont’ worry, Variational Inference: The Path üõ£Ô∏è Forward is here for rescue. I have tried to keep things as streamlined as possible, such that readers don’t have to worry about connecting broken links among concepts.
item.content:encoded:
Ever felt why we even need Variational AutoEncoders when simple AutoEncoders worked greatly?

And what the heck is this Variational Inference anyway?

Leave why or what, whats’ going on with its’ mathematics, too hard to grab any intutive understanding!!

I dealt with these problems for long, and maybe others’ did too.

Dont’ worry, Variational Inference: The Path üõ£Ô∏è Forward is here for rescue.

I have tried to keep things as streamlined as possible, such that readers don’t have to worry about connecting broken links among concepts.

Do give it a read, I hope it will provide some clarity over confusions.

Thankyou,
Eulogs
